name: kalenda
description: A Web3 marketplace on Solana blockchain to tokenize and sell your time as NFTs

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run anchor-dev" "npm run frontend-dev" "npm run backend-dev"
scripts.anchor-dev: cd programs && anchor build && anchor deploy
scripts.test: concurrently "npm run anchor-test" "npm run frontend-test" "npm run backend-test"

author: Kalenda Team
